incident_updates.body: We are currently experiencing an incident affecting our Dedicated Servers offering, which is causing temporary availability issues in the rack LIM0311A01B. Here is detail for this incident : Start time : 03/07/2025 00:30 UTC Impacted Service(s) : Some servers in rack LIM0311A01B are temporarily unavailable. Customers Impact : Some customers are temporarily unable to access and use their servers located in the specified rack. Root Cause : This incident is caused by a cooling system issue. Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible. We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution. We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

affected_components.name: Dedicated Servers || Global Infrastructure - LIM

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

affected_components.name: Dedicated Servers || Global Infrastructure - GRA

scheduled_maintenances.name: [Global][Virtual Private Servers] - Images EoL notification

incident_updates.body:
As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Virtual Private Servers offer. Start time : 04/07/2025 09:00 UTC End time : 04/08/2025 21:00 UTC Service impact : Below-mentioned images will no longer be available to purchase or use. Several images currently offered as part of our VPS offering have reached, or are approaching, End of Life (EoL). As of August 4th, 2025, these images will be officially removed from our VPS catalog in accordance with our End of Life policy. You can read more about our distribution End of Life policy here : https://help.ovhcloud.com/csm/en-gb-public-cloud-compute-vps-image-life-cycle?id=kb_article_view&sysparm_article=KB0050801 Below is the complete list of images, as well our recommendations and alternatives for VPS environments.
EoL DistributionEoL / EoS dateAlternative DistributionRecommended action
Centos 730/06/2024AlmaLinux/ Rocky LinuxBackup and upgrade distribution
Fedora 3705/12/2023Fedora 42Backup and upgrade distribution
Fedora 3821/05/2024Fedora 42Backup and upgrade distribution
If you use automation to deploy your infrastructure with any of these images, we strongly recommend that you either switch to another distribution or upload your own image to use instead. You can refer to the following guides to : Upgrade operating system: https://help.ovhcloud.com/csm/en-gb-public-cloud-compute-upgrade-operating-system?id=kb_article_view&sysparm_article=KB0051306 Upload your image: https://help.ovhcloud.com/csm/en-gb-public-cloud-compute-upload-own-image?id=kb_article_view&sysparm_article=KB0051319 Service improvement : As part of our End of Life policy, the above-mentioned images will no longer be available for purchase or reinstallation in our VPS offering. For any question, please reach out to our support team. Thank you for your understanding.

incident_updates.body: Operations have been rescheduled. The new dates are listed below: Start time : 07/07/2025 04:30 UTC End time : 07/07/2025 10:00 UTC Service impact : Impacted services might experience some input/output freezes for storage equipment during the maintenance. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will perform an update on the storage servers hosting your data. This version will improve certain security mechanisms, as well as some performance enhancements. During the maintenance period, your data will remain available. Thank you for your understanding.

scheduled_maintenances.name: [GRA7][Virtual Private Servers] - Workflow Management service maintenance notification

incident_updates.body: As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Workflow Management service, Mistral. Here are the details of the maintenance: Start time : 08/07/2025 14:00 UTC End time : 08/07/2025 15:00 UTC Service impact : During this maintenance window for the Workflow Management service (Mistral), you may encounter the following impacts : Workflows in progress at the start of the maintenance will be stopped and will be restarted automatically after the maintenance is completed. We understand that this may cause a temporary disruption in your workflow processing, and we apologize for any inconvenience this may cause. Cron triggers (scheduled workflow executions) during the maintenance period will not be triggered. If you have any workflows scheduled to run during the maintenance window, we recommend rescheduling them to run outside of this timeframe to avoid any disruption. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be performing a maintenance on the Mistral service infrastructure. This maintenance is necessary to ensure the continued reliability and performance of our platform. If you have any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out to our support team.
